SELECT T4.Menu_ID , T4.Menu_Name , T4.Menu_Code , T4.Menu_Index , T4.Menu_IsVisible , T4.Menu_IsValid , T5.MenuG_ID , T5.MenuG_Name , T5.MenuG_Code , T5.MenuG_Index , T5.MenuG_IsVisible , T5.MenuG_IsValid , T2.MenuD_ID , T2.MenuD_Name , T2.MenuD_Code , T2.MenuD_Picture , T2.MenuD_ImgListKey , T2.MenuD_Index , T2.MenuD_ClassFullName , T2.MenuD_IsVisible , T2.MenuD_GridPageSize , T2.MenuD_IsValid , T3.Act_ID , T3.Act_Index , T3.Act_Name , T3.Act_Key , T1.MDA_ID FROM SM_MenuDetailAction T1 INNER JOIN SM_MenuDetail T2 ON T2.MenuD_ID = T1.MDA_MenuD_ID AND T2.MenuD_IsValid = 1 AND T2.MenuD_IsVisible = 1 INNER JOIN SM_Action T3 ON T3.Act_ID = T1.MDA_Action_ID AND T1.MDA_IsValid = 1 INNER JOIN SM_Menu T4 ON T4.Menu_ID = T2.MenuD_Menu_ID AND T4.Menu_IsValid = 1 INNER JOIN SM_MenuGroup T5 ON T5.MenuG_ID = T2.MenuD_MenuG_ID AND T5.MenuG_IsValid = 1
INNER JOIN SM_UserMenuAuthority T6 ON T6.UMA_MenuD_ID = T2.MenuD_ID AND T6.UMA_Org_ID = #WHERE_Org_ID# AND T6.UMA_User_ID = #WHERE_User_ID# AND T1.MDA_IsValid = 1 INNER JOIN SM_UserActionAuthority T7 ON T7.UAA_MenuD_ID = T2.MenuD_ID AND T7.UAA_Action_ID = T3.Act_ID AND T7.UAA_Org_ID = #WHERE_Org_ID# AND T7.UAA_User_ID = #WHERE_User_ID# AND T7.UAA_IsValid = 1
WHERE T1.MDA_IsValid = 1 ORDER BY T4.Menu_Index , T5.MenuG_Index , T2.MenuD_Index , T3.Act_Index
